function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to ineffective infection control measures in built environments","Impact":"Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases within buildings, leading to outbreaks and public health risks","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective infection control measures such as occupant movement tracking, occupant counting, social distance monitoring, and fever detection","Technologies":"Intelligent sensors, cameras, artificial intelligence, IoT-based apps, machine learning","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, public health stakeholders","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Limited adoption of IT-driven technologies in facility management domain","Impact":"Inadequate infection control measures due to limited use of technology, leading to increased risk of disease transmission within buildings","Mitigation":"Increased adoption of IT technologies for building management, addressing cost barriers, and expanding implementation of sensor-based systems","Technologies":"ICT-based tools, intelligent sensors, cameras, artificial intelligence, IoT-based apps, machine learning","People":"Facility managers, building owners","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, technology vendors"},{"Description":"Ethical concerns related to capturing occupant information through sensors and cameras","Impact":"Potential infringement of privacy rights and ethical concerns related to data collection in the built environment","Mitigation":"Transparent communication with occupants about data collection, implementation of privacy protection measures, and adherence to ethical guidelines for data use","Technologies":"Intelligent sensors, cameras, artificial intelligence, IoT-based apps","People":"Building occupants, facility managers","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, data privacy authorities"}]}
